A great shooter , but people without Prime access will not enjoy the game at the start because of all the cheaters in casual matchmakings , but if you are desperate to continue playing the game i recommend playing lots of Competitives just because of the xp to get the rank 21 (at that rank you'll get free prime access) and after that u can easly start thinking about grinding your divisions .
